reviewText: Another Christmas present for our son
I would have enjoyed it more if the season had been more competitive.

I ordered one from a seller and noticed it said "Picture Format NTSC" and "Region Code 2" on the back of the DVD case.  At their suggestion, I opened the package and tried the DVDs on 2 of my players.  To my surprise, they played fine.  I think the manufacturer misprinted the case since my DVD players are all Region 1 players.  Now I'm about to go watch the review for the rest of the night.  Great!!!

If you have a set that say "Picture Format PAL" and "Region Code 2" they won't play.
I love being able to review the season.
